mapper.select: /* AppAuth.xml -> selectAppAuthInfo */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY D.PRIORITY, B.PRIORITY) ROWNUM ,A.COMP_CD ,A.POLICY_CD ,C.POLICY_NM ,A.SYSTEM_CD ,A.PROG_CD ,A.STATUS ,CASE WHEN #{LANG} = 'FR' THEN B.PROG_FR WHEN #{LANG} = 'EN' THEN B.PROG_EN ELSE B.PROG_NM END AS PROG_NM ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 1, 1) AUTH_SEARCH ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 2, 1) AUTH_ADD ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 3, 1) AUTH_DEL ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 4, 1) AUTH_SAVE ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 5, 1) AUTH_PRINT ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 6, 1) AUTH_UPLOAD ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 7, 1) AUTH_EXCEL ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 8, 1) AUTH_PDF ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 9, 1) AUTH_CANCEL ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 10, 1) AUTH_USER1 ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 11, 1) AUTH_USER2 ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 12, 1) AUTH_USER3 ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 13, 1) AUTH_USER4 ,SUBSTRING(A.AUTH, 14, 1) AUTH_USER5 ,B.PROG_GROUP ,B.PROG_LV FROM SY_POLICY_L A INNER JOIN SY_PROGRAM B ON A.COMP_CD = B.COMP_CD AND A.PROG_CD = B.PROG_CD INNER JOIN SY_POLICY_H C ON A.COMP_CD = C.COMP_CD AND A.POLICY_CD = C.POLICY_CD INNER JOIN SY_SYSTEM D ON B.COMP_CD = D.COMP_CD AND B.SYSTEM_CD = D.SYSTEM_CD WHERE A.COMP_CD = #{G_COMP_CD} AND A.POLICY_CD = #{POLICY_CD}
